cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's harikiru

sentence.kanji: 母は張り切ってお弁当を用意したの。
sentence.romaji: haha ha harikite obentou wo youi shita no
sentence.english: My mother went all out when she made this lunch box.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yokubari

sentence.kanji: 彼女は欲張りです。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha yokubari desu
sentence.english: She's greedy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ibaru

sentence.kanji: 彼は威張ってなんかいません。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ibate nanka imasen
sentence.english: He's not putting on airs.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hosonagai

sentence.kanji: その細長い棒を取ってください。
sentence.romaji: sono hosonagai bou wo tote kudasai
sentence.english: Please take that long, thin stick.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kegawa

sentence.kanji: 彼女は毛皮のコートを着ていたの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kegawa no ko-to wo kite ita no
sentence.english: She wore a fur coat.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keito

sentence.kanji: 彼女は毛糸のセーターを編みました。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha keito no se-ta- wo amimashita
sentence.english: She knitted a woolen sweater.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's o

sentence.kanji: 尾の長い鳥が飛んでいますね。
sentence.romaji: o no nagai tori ga tonde imasu ne
sentence.english: A bird with a long tail is flying.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haru

sentence.kanji: 疲れて肩が張っています。
sentence.romaji: tsukarete kata ga hate imasu
sentence.english: My shoulders are stiff with fatigue.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaishaku

sentence.kanji: この詩を解釈してみましょう。
sentence.romaji: kono shi wo kaishaku shite mimashou
sentence.english: Let's try to interpret this poem.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chousho

sentence.kanji: 君の長所は明るいところだね。
sentence.romaji: kimi no chousho ha akarui tokoro da ne
sentence.english: Your strong point is your cheerfulness.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's me

sentence.kanji: チューリップの芽が出ました。
sentence.romaji: chu-ripu no me ga demashita
sentence.english: The tulip buds emerged.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuuchou

sentence.kanji: 銀行の通帳を持ってきてください。
sentence.romaji: ginkou no tsuuchou wo mote kite kudasai
sentence.english: Please bring your bank book.

cards.english: being on duty, person on duty
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's touban

sentence.kanji: 今日は私が掃除の当番です。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha watashi ga souji no touban desu
sentence.english: I'm in charge of the cleaning today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shingi

sentence.kanji: その問題は審議中です。
sentence.romaji: sono mondai ha shingichuu desu
sentence.english: The issue is under deliberation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tenrankai

sentence.kanji: 昨日、絵の展覧会に行ってきました。
sentence.romaji: kinou e no tenrankai ni ite kimashita
sentence.english: I went to an exhibition yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiraga

sentence.kanji: 祖父は白髪が少ないほうです。
sentence.romaji: sofu ha shiraga ga sukunai hou desu
sentence.english: My grandfather has relatively little gray hair.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mujaki

sentence.kanji: 子供たちが無邪気に遊んでいるね。
sentence.romaji: kodomotachi ga mujaki ni asonde iru ne
sentence.english: The kids are playing so innocently.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakuchou

sentence.kanji: その会社は店舗を拡張していますね。
sentence.romaji: sono kaisha ha tenpo wo kakuchou shite imasu ne
sentence.english: The company is expanding the store.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gichou

sentence.kanji: 議長が開会の挨拶をしました。
sentence.romaji: gichou ga kaikai no aisatsu wo shimashita
sentence.english: The chairman made the opening greetings for the meeting.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gakuchou

sentence.kanji: 入学式で学長の挨拶がありました。
sentence.romaji: nyuugakushiki de gakuchou no aisatsu ga arimashita
sentence.english: The headmaster gave a greeting speech at the entrance ceremony.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mayuge

sentence.kanji: 彼女の眉毛は太いな。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no mayuge ha futoi na
sentence.english: She has thick eyebrows.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's konban

sentence.kanji: 今晩のパーティーは何時からですか。
sentence.romaji: konban no pa-tei- ha nanji kara desu ka
sentence.english: From what time is the party tonight?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ban

sentence.kanji: 晩ご飯は食べましたか。
sentence.romaji: bangohan ha tabemashita ka
sentence.english: Have you had dinner?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atatakai

sentence.kanji: このコートはとても暖かい。
sentence.romaji: kono ko-to ha totemo atatakai。
sentence.english: This coat is really warm.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's benkyou

sentence.kanji: 私は日本語を勉強しています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha nihongo wo benkyou shite imasu
sentence.english: I'm studying Japanese.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atatameru

sentence.kanji: 今、車を暖めています。
sentence.romaji: ima kuruma wo atatameteimasu
sentence.english: I'm warming up the car now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atatamaru

sentence.kanji: まだ部屋が暖まらない。
sentence.romaji: mada heya ga atatamaranai。
sentence.english: The room hasn't warmed up yet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kantan

sentence.kanji: この料理はとても簡単です。
sentence.romaji: kono ryouri ha totemo kantan desu
sentence.english: This dish is very easy to make.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shima

sentence.kanji: 日本は島国です。
sentence.romaji: nipon ha shimaguni desu
sentence.english: Japan is an island nation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's maiban

sentence.kanji: 姉は毎晩日記を書いています。
sentence.romaji: ane ha maiban niki wo kaite imasu
sentence.english: My older sister writes in her diary every evening.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's senkyo

sentence.kanji: 彼は選挙に出るつもりだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha senkyo ni deru tsumori da
sentence.english: He intends to run in the election.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuushoku

sentence.kanji: 最近、若い人たちの就職が難しくなっています。
sentence.romaji: saikin wakai hitotachi no shuushoku ga muzukashiku nate imasu
sentence.english: It's been hard for young people to find jobs recently.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taishou

sentence.kanji: このアンケートは大学生が対象です。
sentence.romaji: kono anke-to ha daigakusei ga taishou desu
sentence.english: This questionnaire targets university students.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sensou

sentence.kanji: 2003年にイラクで戦争があった。
sentence.romaji: nisensannen ni iraku de sensou ga ata
sentence.english: There was a war in Iraq in 2003.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yureru

sentence.kanji: 風で木が揺れています。
sentence.romaji: kaze de ki ga yurete imasu
sentence.english: The trees are swaying in the wind.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's danbou

sentence.kanji: 冬は暖房が必要です。
sentence.romaji: fuyu ha danbou ga hitsuyou desu
sentence.english: Heating is necessary in winter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yurui

sentence.kanji: このズボンは緩いです。
sentence.romaji: kono zubon ha yurui desu
sentence.english: These trousers are loose.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakura

sentence.kanji: 桜は三月か四月に咲きます。
sentence.romaji: sakura ha sangatsu ka shigatsu ni sakimasu
sentence.english: Cherry blossoms bloom in March or April.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's menkyoshou

sentence.kanji: 免許証を見せてください。
sentence.romaji: menkyoshou wo misete kudasai
sentence.english: Please show me your license.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kibishii

sentence.kanji: 私の上司はとても厳しい。
sentence.romaji: watashi no joushi ha totemo kibishii
sentence.english: My boss is very strict.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tori

sentence.kanji: 鳥が飛んでいます。
sentence.romaji: tori ga tonde imasu
sentence.english: A bird is flying.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naru

sentence.kanji: 今朝、5時に電話が鳴った。
sentence.romaji: kesa goji ni denwa ga nata
sentence.english: The telephone rang this morning at five o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naku

sentence.kanji: どこかでネコが鳴いている。
sentence.romaji: dokoka de neko ga naite iru
sentence.english: A cat is meowing somewhere.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiku

sentence.kanji: 彼はギターを弾きます。
sentence.romaji: kare ha gita- wo hikimasu
sentence.english: He plays the guitar.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's niwatori

sentence.kanji: その鶏は毎朝鳴きます。
sentence.romaji: sono niwatori ha maiasa nakimasu
sentence.english: The rooster crows every morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanzume

sentence.kanji: 缶詰のフルーツはとても甘い。
sentence.romaji: kanzume no furu-tsu ha totemo amai
sentence.english: Canned fruit is very sweet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kan

sentence.kanji: コーヒーはその缶に入っています。
sentence.romaji: ko-hi- ha sono kan ni haite imasu
sentence.english: The coffee is in that can.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keru

sentence.kanji: ゴールキーパーがボールを蹴った。
sentence.romaji: go-ruki-pa- ga bo-ru wo keta。
sentence.english: The goalkeeper kicked the ball.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atataka

sentence.kanji: 最近は暖かです。
sentence.romaji: saikin ha atataka desu
sentence.english: The weather has been warm recently.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tango

sentence.kanji: 日本語の単語をいくつ知っていますか。
sentence.romaji: nihongo no tango wo ikutsu shite imasu ka
sentence.english: How many Japanese words do you know?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tansuu

sentence.kanji: penは単数でpensは複数です。
sentence.romaji: penha tansuu de penzu ha fukusuu desu
sentence.english: Pen is the singular and "pens" is the plural.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hantou

sentence.kanji: 台風がその半島を通過したの。
sentence.romaji: taifuu ga sono hantou wo tsuuka shita no
sentence.english: The typhoon passed over the peninsula.
